5.2 Pattern Library.autocomplete Autocomplete

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

Example
  • Amy O'Connor
  • Andrew Daniels
  • Brittany Risher
  • Christine Fennessy
  • Denise Schipani
  • Dennis Barket
  • Doug Donaldson
  • Gail Gibson Hunt
  • Jackie Gentilesco
  • Jackie Veling
Markup: input-autocomplete/input-autocomplete.twig 
<div class="field--type-entity-reference field--name-field-author-ref field--widget-entity-reference-autocomplete-tags js-form-wrapper form-wrapper" data-drupal-selector="edit-field-author-ref-wrapper" id="edit-field-author-ref-wrapper">
  <div class="js-form-item form-item js-form-type-entity-autocomplete form-type-entity-autocomplete js-form-item-field-author-ref-target-id form-item-field-author-ref-target-id">
    <label for="edit-field-author-ref-target-id">Author</label>
    <input data-drupal-selector="edit-field-author-ref-target-id" class="form-autocomplete form-text ui-autocomplete-input" data-autocomplete-path="/entity_reference_autocomplete/taxonomy_term/default%3Ataxonomy_term/whcwpryW3HKLe1PDF_0tW4nqPx8wDLGWj9G1NPstIlw" type="text" id="edit-field-author-ref-target-id" name="field_author_ref[target_id]" value="Nina Lincoff (14341)" size="60" maxlength="1024" placeholder="" autocomplete="off" tabindex="-1">
  </div>
</div>

5.3 Pattern Library.breadcrumbs Breadcrumbs

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

Example

Breadcrumb

  1. Home
  2. Node
  3. 5 Ways to Cope with the Buspirone Shortage
Markup: breadcrumbs/breadcrumbs.twig 
<nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation" aria-labelledby="system-breadcrumb">

  <h2 id="system-breadcrumb" class="visually-hidden">Breadcrumb</h2>

  <span class="icon i-admin-breadcrumb-back"></span>

  <ol>
    <li class="breadcrumb__item">
      <a href="/">Home</a>
    </li>
    <li class="breadcrumb__item">
      <a href="/node">Node</a>
    </li>
    <li class="breadcrumb__item">
      <a href="/article/health/shortage">5 Ways to Cope with the Buspirone Shortage</a>
    </li>
  </ol>
</nav>
Source: primer/components/_breadcrumbs.scss, line 1

5.6 Pattern Library.horz Tabs Horizontal

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

Examples
Default styling
  • View
  • Edit
  • Delete
:hover
Highlights when hovering.
  • View
  • Edit
  • Delete
Markup: tabs-horz/tabs-horz.twig 
<ul class="tabs primary clearfix">
  <li class="tabs__tab">
    <a href="/article">View</a>
  </li>
  <li class="tabs__tab is-active">
    <a href="/edit">Edit</a>
  </li>
  <li class="tabs__tab">
    <a href="/delete">Delete</a>
  </li>
</ul>

5.8 Pattern Library.list List

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

Example
  • Block layout
    Configure what block content appears in your site's sidebars and other regions.
  • Comment types
    Manage form and displays settings of comments.
  • Contact forms
    Create and manage contact forms.
  • Content types
    Create and manage fields, forms, and display settings for your content.
  • Display modes
    Configure what displays are available for your content and forms.
Markup: list/list.twig 
<ul class="list">
  <li class="list__item">
    <a href="/block">
      <span class="label">Block layout</span>
      <div class="description">Configure what block content appears in your site's sidebars and other regions.</div>
    </a>
  </li>
  <li class="list__item">
    <a href="/comment">
      <span class="label">Comment types</span>
      <div class="description">Manage form and displays settings of comments.</div>
    </a>
  </li>
  <li class="list__item">
    <a href="/contact">
      <span class="label">Contact forms</span>
      <div class="description">Create and manage contact forms.</div>
    </a>
  </li>
  <li class="list__item">
    <a href="/types">
      <span class="label">Content types</span>
      <div class="description">Create and manage fields, forms, and display settings for your content.</div>
    </a>
  </li>
  <li class="list__item">
    <a href="/display-modes">
      <span class="label">Display modes</span>
      <div class="description">Configure what displays are available for your content and forms.</div>
    </a>
  </li>
</ul>
Source: primer/components/_list.scss, line 1

5.9 Pattern Library.messages System Messages

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Your standard button suitable for clicking.

.messages--status .messages--warning .messages--error

Example

Status message

Cache cleared.

Status message

Cache cleared.

Status message

Cache cleared.
Markup: messages/messages.twig 
<div role="contentinfo" aria-label="Status message" class="messages messages--status">
   <h2 class="visually-hidden">Status message</h2>
   Cache cleared.
</div>

<div role="contentinfo" aria-label="Status message" class="messages messages--warning">
   <h2 class="visually-hidden">Status message</h2>
   Cache cleared.
</div>

<div role="contentinfo" aria-label="Status message" class="messages messages--error">
   <h2 class="visually-hidden">Status message</h2>
   Cache cleared.
</div>
Source: primer/components/_messages.scss, line 1

5.10 Pattern Library.pager Pager

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

For paginated content

Example

Pagination

  • Current page1
  • Page2
  • Page3
  • Page4
  • Page5
  • Page6
  • Page7
  • Page8
  • …
  • Next page Next ›
  • Last page Last »
Markup: pager/pager.twig 
<nav class="pager" role="navigation" aria-labelledby="pagination">

  <h4 id="pagination-heading" class="visually-hidden">Pagination</h4>
  
  <ul class="pager__items">

    <li class="pager__item is-active">
        <a href="?page=0" title="Current page"><span class="visually-hidden">Current page</span>1</a>
    </li>

    <li class="pager__item">
        <a href="?page=1" title="Go to page 2"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>2</a>
    </li>

    <li class="pager__item">
      <a href="?page=2" title="Go to page 3"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>3</a>
    </li>

    <li class="pager__item">
      <a href="?page=3" title="Go to page 4"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>4</a>
    </li>

    <li class="pager__item">
      <a href="?page=4" title="Go to page 5"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>5</a>
    </li>
 
    <li class="pager__item">
      <a href="?page=5" title="Go to page 6"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>6</a>
    </li>
   
    <li class="pager__item">
      <a href="?page=6" title="Go to page 7"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>7</a>
    </li>
   
    <li class="pager__item">
      <a href="?page=7" title="Go to page 8"><span class="visually-hidden">Page</span>8</a>
    </li>
    
    <li class="pager__item pager__item--ellipsis" role="presentation">…</li>
    
    <li class="pager__item pager__item--next">
      <a href="?page=1" title="Go to next page" rel="next">
        <span class="visually-hidden">Next page</span>
        <span aria-hidden="true">Next ›</span>
      </a>
    </li>
    
    <li class="pager__item pager__item--last">
      <a href="?page=123" title="Go to last page">
        <span class="visually-hidden">Last page</span>
        <span aria-hidden="true">Last »</span>
      </a>
    </li>
  </ul>
</nav>
Source: primer/components/_pager.scss, line 1

5.12 Pattern Library.Text Statement

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Text Component, Combines a pre-title/title with a short descriptive text

Examples
Default styling

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
.text--regular
description

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
.text--large
description

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
.text--super
description

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
.align--left
description

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
.align--right
description

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
.align--center
description

Lorem Ipsum

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur et. Aenean eu leo quam.

Learn More
Markup: statement/statement.twig 
<div class="text {{ modifier_class }}">
   <div class="inner-wrapper">
         
      <h2 class="title">{{ title }}</h2>
      
      <div class="field field--name-field-statement-dek field--type-string-long field__item">
         <h3 class="dek">{{ dek }}</h3>
         
         <div class="field field--name-field-statement-cta field--type-link field__item">
            <a href="{{ url }}"> {{ cta }}</a>
         </div>
      </div>

   </div>
</div>
Source: primer/components/_text.scss, line 1
